AutoScalingGroupName.description: The name of the Auto Scaling group.

InstanceIds.description: One or more instances to move into Standby mode. You must specify at least one instance ID.

ShouldDecrementDesiredCapacity.description: Specifies whether the instances moved to Standby mode count as part of the Auto Scaling group's desired capacity. If set, the desired capacity for the Auto Scaling group decrements by the number of instances moved to Standby mode.
